Sample Dataset¶

This project includes a sample dataset for mlforkids.

Contents¶

Dataset Summary¶

Image

Symmetry Group

Training Set

# of Images Used

Observation

P1 & P2

Control: colored and B&W Biased: only B&W

30

Control classifies color images; biased does not.

P1 & P2

Control: colored and B&W Biased: only B&W

20

Control classifies color images; biased does not.

P1 & P2

Control: regular & 90° rotated Biased: only regular

30

Control classifies rotated images; biased does not.

P1 & P2

Control: regular & zoomed Biased: only regular

60

Control classifies zoomed images; biased does not.

P1 & P2

Control: regular & zoomed Biased: only regular

30

Control classifies zoomed images; biased does not.

P1 & P2

Control: regular, rotated, and zoomed Biased: only regular

90

Control classifies zoomed/rotated images; biased does not classify rotated images.
